EmailTemplate.name: IPRD Accepted Template
EmailTemplate.subject: IP Request - {!CMOS_BU_IP_Request__c.Name} has been Accepted
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!CMOS_BU_IP_Request__c.CreatedBy},
Your IP Request {!CMOS_BU_IP_Request__c.Name} submitted on {!CMOS_BU_IP_Request__c.CreatedDate} has been accepted.
Please contact the IP team for further information or review the original IP submission.
Thanks.
NOTE: This is a system generated message. Please do not reply to this email.
